definitions.definition: A person who oversees and directs the work of others; a supervisor .
examples: The boss of the company was going to Spain for work.

definitions.definition: A person in charge of a business or company .
examples: Chat turned to whisper when the boss entered the conference room.
My boss complains that I'm always late to work.

definitions.definition: A leader , the head of an organized group or team .
examples: They named him boss because he had good leadership skills.

definitions.definition: The head of a political party in a given region or district .
examples: He is the Republican boss in Kentucky.

definitions.definition: ( informal , especially India , MLE and Philippines ) A term of address to a man, especially a customer , but also sometimes to a friend or acquaintance of equal standing.
( video games ) An enemy , often at the end of a level , that is particularly challenging and must be beaten in order to progress.
( humorous ) Wife . ( Can we verify this sense?)
examples: There's no olive oil; will sunflower oil do? — I'll have to run that by the boss .

main_definition: A person who oversees and directs the work of others; a supervisor .
secondary_definitions: A person in charge of a business or company .
A leader , the head of an organized group or team .
The head of a political party in a given region or district .
( informal , especially India , MLE and Philippines ) A term of address to a man, especially a customer , but also sometimes to a friend or acquaintance of equal standing.
( video games ) An enemy , often at the end of a level , that is particularly challenging and must be beaten in order to progress.
( humorous ) Wife . ( Can we verify this sense?)

definitions.definition: A swelling , lump or protuberance in an animal, person or object.

subdefinitions.definition: ( geology ) A lump-like mass of rock , especially one projecting through a stratum of different rock.
A convex protuberance in hammered work, especially the rounded projection in the centre of a shield .
( mechanics ) A protrusion ; frequently a cylinder of material that extends beyond a hole .
( architecture ) A knob or projection , usually at the intersection of ribs in a vault .
( architecture ) A roughly cut stone set in place for later carving.

definitions.definition: ( archery ) A target block, made of foam but historically made of hay bales, to which a target face is attached.
A wooden vessel for the mortar used in tiling or masonry, hung by a hook from the laths, or from the rounds of a ladder.
A head or reservoir of water .

main_definition: A swelling , lump or protuberance in an animal, person or object.
secondary_definitions: ( archery ) A target block, made of foam but historically made of hay bales, to which a target face is attached.
A wooden vessel for the mortar used in tiling or masonry, hung by a hook from the laths, or from the rounds of a ladder.
A head or reservoir of water .

definitions.definition: A hassock or small seat, especially made from a bundle of straw.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A hassock or small seat, especially made from a bundle of straw.
